Name: A
Description: Is there a category of adjectives?

Name: A/pred
Description: Can adjectives be used as predicates?

Name: A-XP
Description: Can the dependent follow a predicative adjective?

Name: XP-A
Description: Can the dependent precede a predicative adjective?

Name: A/attr
Description: Can adjectives be used as modifiers?

Name: A-N
Description: Can adjectival modifiers be placed prenominally?

Name: N-A
Description: Can adjectival modifiers be placed postnominally?

Name: AP-N
Description: Can prenominal adjectival modifiers take dependents?

Name: A-XP-N
Description: Can the dependent follow the head in prenominal adjectival modifiers?

Name: XP-A-N
Description: Can the dependent precede the head in prenominal adjectival modifiers?

Name: N-AP
Description: Can postnominal adjectival modifiers take dependents?

Name: N-A-XP
Description: Can the dependent follow the head in postnominal adjectival modifiers?

Name: N-XP-A
Description: Can the dependent precede the head in postnominal adjectival modifiers?
